name: db_mysql
long_description:
= RightScale MySQL Database Cookbook

== DESCRIPTION:

Provides the MySQL implementation of the 'db' resource to install and manage
MySQL database stand-alone servers and clients.

== REQUIREMENTS:

* Requires a server launched from a RightScale managed RightImage.

== COOKBOOKS DEPENDENCIES:

Please see <tt>metadata.rb</tt> file for the latest dependencies.

== KNOWN LIMITATIONS:

There are no known limitations.

== SETUP:

* Place the <tt>db_mysql::default</tt> recipe into your runlist to load the
  MySQL provider, tuning parameters, as well as other MySQL-specific attributes
  into the node as inputs.

* Place the <tt>db::default</tt> recipe into your runlist to set up the 'db' resource.
  When using a RightScale ServerTemplate, this will also automatically add the
  common database attributes to your ServerTemplate's inputs.

== USAGE:

=== Basic usage

Once setup, use the recipes in the 'db' cookbook to install and manage your
MySQL database servers and clients. See the <tt>db/README.rdoc</tt> for usage
details.

=== MySQL Tuning and my.cnf

Custom tuning parameters can be applied by overriding the
<tt>mysql_tuning.rb</tt> attributes file. For more information and an example
override repository please see: {Override Chef Cookbooks}[http://support.rightscale.com/12-Guides/Chef_Cookbooks_Developer_Guide/08-Chef_Development/Override_Chef_Cookbooks].

== DETAILS:

The 'db' implementation is defined by a Lightweight Provider, which can be
found in the <tt>providers/default.rb</tt> file.

db_mysql/tmpdir.description: Defines the location of your MySQL temp directory. Sets the 'tmpdir' variable in the MySQL config file. Example: /tmp

db_mysql/log_bin.description: Defines the filename and location of your MySQL stored binlog files. Sets the 'log-bin' variable in the MySQL config file. Example: /mnt/mysql-binlogs/mysql-bin

db_mysql/binlog_format.description: Defines the format of your MySQL stored binlog files. Sets the 'binlog_format' option in the MySQL config file. Accepted options: STATEMENT, ROW, and MIXED

db_mysql/server_usage.description: When set to 'dedicated' all server resources are allocated to MySQL. When set to 'shared' less resources are allocated for MySQL so that it can be run concurrently with other apps like Apache and Rails for example.  Example: shared

db_mysql/version.description: Specify the MySQL version that matches the ServerTemplate's specified MySQL version. Note: MySQL 5.5 is not supported on Ubuntu 10.04. Example: 5.5

db_mysql/init_timeout.description: Defines timeout to wait for a MySQL socket connection before a READ LOCK. Default: 600

recipes.db_mysql::default_5_1: Set the DB MySQL provider. Sets version 5.1 and node variables specific to MySQL 5.1.
